scripts.build: echo 'Building...';COMPOSER_PROCESS_TIMEOUT=2000 composer install; drush updb -y; drush cim -y; npm run compile:force; drush cr; echo 'Build complete.'
scripts.compile: echo 'Compiling SASS into CSS'; sass --quiet --style=$npm_package_config_style $npm_package_config_scss:$npm_package_config_css; echo 'Done!'
scripts.compile:force: npm run clean; npm run compile
